thread.title: Alent wins antitrust clearance in Germany for Platform Specialty deal
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Alent wins antitrust clearance in Germany for Platform Specialty deal | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Alent wins antitrust clearance in Germany for Platform Specialty deal
text:
Sept 10 Alent Plc :
* Antitrust clearance in Germany
* This follow clearances received from US and South Korean anti-trust authorities for proposed acquisition
* All other anti-trust and regulatory filings for proposed acquisition have been initiated and are proceeding in normal course
* Scheme is expected to become effective in late 2015 or early 2016 Source text for Eikon: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136)
